Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1175.jpg'}
{3: 'You gently push open the door to the private theater suite. Warm amber light spills out, revealing a cozy space lined with sound-dampening carpet and elegant decor.'}
{3: 'Bridget takes a few steps forward, then happily flops onto the soft cushions of the sofa.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "It's rare to get a proper day off. Gotta find the perfect spot to relax.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She stretches out on the sofa, letting out a long, contented sigh.'}
{2: 'What movie are we watching today?', 3: '13'}
{3: 'You walk over to the projector, flipping through a stack of vintage videotapes as you ask.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Oh, right! I heard this theater has a bunch of rare Golden Age tapes that even WGAA doesn't have. Let's pick one they've never shown at the Babylonia theater.", 4: '1'}
{2: "(Something they've never shown...)", 3: '17'}
{3: 'After rummaging through the box for about half a minute, you pull out an old, battered B-movie tape.'}
{3: 'The title reads The Room. The cover shows a phantom hand made with terrible special effects, next to a ridiculous tagline: Low Budget, Big Impact!'}
{3: 'You get the feeling this movie is going to be spectacularly bad.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Sometimes it's fun to watch something so obscure no one's even reviewed it. Want to go with this one?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She fiddles with her terminal for a while, searching, but seems to find no results. She shuts off the screen.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Alright, let's play it!", 4: '1'}
{2: '(Turn off the lights and press play)', 3: '30'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory378.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory378.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiDianying.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'And just like that, you and Bridget settle into the loveseat to enjoy this mysterious old horror flick.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory379.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory379.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}
{3: 'The worn film stock makes the already low-budget visuals even harder to make out, and the plot is so cliche and dull it starts putting you to sleep fast.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'But with Bridget sitting next to you, you push through and try to keep your eyes on the screen.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zombie in the Movie', 3: 'ROAAAAARRRR————!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiDianying.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1006', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.5', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1175.jpg'}
{3: 'Right as the zombie shrieks on screen, you hear a surprised yelp beside you, followed by the unmistakable sound of fabric ripping.'}
{3: 'You turn to look—Bridget has torn the throw pillow in her arms in half.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "N-no, I wasn't scared, really! That close-up just caught me off guard...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She quickly hides the shredded pillow behind her back, clearly flustered.'}
{2: "(So she's afraid of zombies...)", 3: '69'}
{2: "Since the pillow's done for, want to lean against me instead?", 3: '70', 4: '(Continue sitting where you are and observe her reaction)', 5: '72'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Okay, if you say so.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Blushing slightly, she hides her face behind your shoulder.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Sorry... 【kuroname】, mind if I lean on your arm?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Blushing, she hides her face behind your shoulder.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "This is so embarrassing... I'll have to pay for that pillow when we leave...", 4: '1'}
{3: "She seems to think the movie's sound is loud enough to cover her muttering."}
{2: '(Silently sit up straight)', 3: '79', 4: '(Offer her a drink)', 5: '81'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Wow, those effects look so real...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Oh, thanks, 【kuroname】!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Even though she's still a bit scared, her eyes stay fixed on the screen."}
{1: '1006', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0.5', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory382.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory382.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiDianying.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "Before you know it, the arm she's been clinging to starts to go numb. Thankfully, the movie is almost over."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiDianying.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: "Just as the atmosphere starts to settle down, there's a loud snap, and the room goes completely dark."}
{3: 'In the sudden blackness, you feel yourself pushed down onto the sofa cushions. Bridget grabs your arm and shields you with her body.'}
{3: "Thanks to the reflexes she's developed from her time in the Support Force, there's no pain at all. Instead, you feel a warm pressure around your shoulders, almost like being gently held."}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Commandant! Are you okay?'}
{3: "Still shaken by the horror movie, her voice sounds tense, like she's ready to fight off a real threat."}
{2: "I-I'm fine...", 3: '110', 4: "It's just a power outage...!", 5: '110'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1175.jpg'}
{3: 'Just as you finish speaking, you hear the hum of the electric box overhead, and the room lights up again in an instant.'}
{3: 'Now that the lights are back on, Bridget finally sees everything in the room clearly.'}
{3: "It's like she's snapping out of a dream. Her hands unclench slowly."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: '【kuroname】...? Are you okay?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBlackPassScene.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory748.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: '...Please, 【kuroname】, just finish this drink and pretend none of this ever happened.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After paying for the pillow, Bridget practically drags you to a nearby bar.'}
{3: 'A tall glass of fragrant, golden brew slides across the counter toward you.'}
{2: "Don't think you can get away with just one glass.", 3: '129'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Order as many as you want. It's on me today!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Sigh... I am never watching some no-review cult movie ever again.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She slumps into her seat and rubs her temples.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Good thing I came with you, 【kuroname】. If I'd come with anyone else...", 4: '1'}
{2: "I don't think it was that bad.", 3: '138'}
{2: "Don't worry, your secret's safe with me, including the part where you're afraid of zombies.", 3: '139'}
{3: "She stops herself mid-sentence, then lowers her head, clearly knowing there's no point in finding excuses."}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Fine... but still, watching a movie with you today... was a lot of fun.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her fair fingertip traces the rim of her glass, then stops and gently taps the tip of your nose.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Alright, what's done is done. Time to shake it off!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Next time, we're going to see another movie together!", 4: '1'}
{3: "She's fully bounced back now, resting her chin on one hand and pointing to your nose with the other, smiling."}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "And in return, you have to tell me one of your secrets too. That's only fair, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sure, no problem.', 3: '152', 4: 'You know this is basically blackmail.', 5: '154'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "So tonight, let's drink until we drop and wash away all that fear.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Not at all. I call it a fair exchange!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The brown-haired Construct lifts her glass and downs the rest of her electrolyte drink in one go.'}
{3: 'Then she sets the empty glass down with a loud clink and lets out a satisfied smile.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Well then, now that you've agreed, I'm not letting you off that easily.", 4: '1'}
